Checks if a chain ID is supported by the Alchemy RPC registry.

## Import

```ts
import { isChainSupported } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### chainId

`number`
The chain ID to check

## Returns

`boolean`
True if the chain is supported, false otherwise
